forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
